summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of North and Northwest 136th St. from Greenwood Ave. North to 3rd Ave. Northwest; and certain other streets, avenues and a right of way; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17420 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
